tasks.label: Restart Dev Server
tasks.command: taskkill /F /IM node.exe 2>$null; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .next -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; npm run dev

tasks.label: Kill and Restart
tasks.command: Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force; Start-Sleep 3; npm run dev
